smtp-server.description: SMTP server used by Grafana to send emails (in host:port format). Leaving this empty will disable email sending.

smtp-username.description: Username to connect to SMTP server

smtp-password.description: Password to connect to SMTP server

email-from-address.description: Email address used in `From:` header of emails

email-from-name.description: Name used in `From:` header of emails

custom-domain.description: Custom domain to use when requesting a rapid-cdn frontend

caucase.description: Caucase configuration. To connect external agents, it's required to approve their client certificates, either using an external caucase referenced as `external-caucase-url` or registering a user with `user-auto-approve-count`

external-caucase-url.description: URL of a caucase instance to manage all server and clients certificates, to use instead of embedding caucase

user-auto-approve-count.description: Number of users to automatically approve in the embedded caucase

default-retention-policy-days.description: Number of days to keep metrics data

retention-period-days.description: Number of days to keep log data
